#AIRLINE DETAILS
```{sql connection=}
CREATE TABLE Airline(
airline_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
airline_name TEXT NOT NULL 
)
```

#AIRCRAFT DETAILS
```{sql connection=}
CREATE TABLE Aircraft(
  aircraft_ID INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  aircraft_type TEXT,
  aircraft_model TEXT NOT NULL,
  number_of_engines NUMBER NOT NULL,
  is_airplane_large TEXT,
  airline_ID INTEGER,
  FOREIGN KEY(airline_ID) REFERENCES Airline(airline_ID)
)
```

#BIRD DETAILS
```{sql connection=}
CREATE TABLE Bird(
  bird_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  species TEXT,
  size TEXT NOT NULL
)
```

#BIRD STRUCK DETAILS
```{sql connection=}
CREATE TABLE BirdStruck(
  bs_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  number_struck NOT NULL,
  number_struck_actual NOT NULL
)
```

#EVENTS
```{sql connection=}
CREATE TABLE Events(
  event_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  phase_of_flight TEXT,
  altitude_bin TEXT,
  feet_above NUMBER NOT NULL,
  flight_date DATE NOT NULL,
  sky TEXT NOT NULL,
  precipitation TEXT NOT NULL
)
```

#LOCATION DETAILS
```{sql connection=}
CREATE TABLE LocationDetails(
  location_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  airport_name TEXT NOT NULL,
  state TEXT NOT NULL
)
```

#COLLISSION DETAILS
```{sql connection=}
CREATE TABLE Collision(
  c_ID NUMBER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL,
  impact_to_flight TEXT NOT NULL,
  indicated_damage TEXT NOT NULL,
  pilot_warned TEXT NOT NULL,          #MAYBE USE BOOLEAN
  remarks TEXT,
  number_of_injured NUMBER NOT NULL,
  cost NUMBER NOT NULL,
  remains_collected TEXT NOT NULL,     #MAYBE USE BOOLEAN
  remains_submitted TEXT NOT NULL,     #MAYBE USE BOOLEAN
  airline_ID NUMBER,
  bird_ID NUMBER,
  bs_ID NUMBER,
  event_ID NUMBER,
  location_ID NUMBER,
  FOREIGN KEY(airline_ID) REFERENCES Airline(airline_ID)
  FOREIGN KEY(bird_ID) REFERENCES Bird(bird_ID)
  FOREIGN KEY(bs_ID) REFERENCES BirdStruck(bs_ID)
  FOREIGN KEY(event_ID) REFERENCES Events(event_ID)
  FOREIGN KEY(location_ID) REFERENCES LocationDetails(location_ID)
)
```
